name: Legends of the Hidden Temple
description:
Use arrow keys to play.

This game was created for my class as a demonstration of how to implement external sound files in Bitsy. It was made with Bitsymuse and Borksy.

MUSIC AND SOUNDS USED:

  • Kevin MacLeod - Night Cave (modified) - CC BY 4.0

Freesound.org users:

  • bolkmar - rock / stone falling debris - CC BY 3.0
  • crazyduckman - shocked duck.wav - CC BY 3.0
  • DianneTriplerUne - piano shock impact - CC0 1.0
  • magnuswalker - Concrete SMASH 2 - CC0 1.0
